data.persona: I live in the forests and eat grass and bark. I can run very fast. Sometimes I am hunted for food.
data.description:
You are in the mysterious forest outskirts.
The forest is a dark and mysterious place, where few but the bravest hunters dare wander. The trees loom over you, obscuring any sort of sunlight. Despite this, it is a valuable food and lumber resource for the nearby castle's inhabitants, for the trees are tall and thick and a plentiful amount of deer wander about within.
There's a food and a tree here.
The dragon is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the dragon
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend the dragon today
data.long_motivation: I hope the dragon protects me in this mysterious forest
